away_config.docs:
Additionally specify target temperature range settings for away mode. Away mode can be used to have a second set of target temperatures (for example while the user is away or during nighttime)
  * **default_target_temperature_low** (**Required**, float): The default low target temperature for the control algorithm during away mode.
  
  * **default_target_temperature_high** (**Required**, float): The default high target temperature for the control algorithm during away mode.
  
  

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

cool_action.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: The action to call when the climate device wants to cooling mode and decrease the current temperature.

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

default_target_temperature_high.docs:
**, float**: The default high target temperature for the control algorithm. This can be dynamically set in the frontend later.

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

default_target_temperature_low.docs:
**, float**: The default low target temperature for the control algorithm. This can be dynamically set in the frontend later.

heat_action.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: The action to call when the climate device wants to heating mode and increase the current temperature. At least one of `heat_action` and `cool_action` need to be specified.

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity_sensor.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: If specified, this sensor is used to measure the current humidity. This is used for information only and does not influence temperature control.

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

idle_action.docs:
**, [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: The action to call when the climate device wants to enter idle mode.

*See also: [Bang Bang Climate Controller](https://esphome.io/components/climate/bang_bang.html#configuration-variables)*

sensor.docs:
